summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 47th Street from 7th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; 8th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street; 9th Avenue Northeast from Eat 45th Street to East 50th Street; and 10th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2751 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
